ygData.subject: Re: Fire Fingers
ygData.msgSnippet: Its an awesome spell as a joke.  You can run up to parties that are fighting groups of monsters.. cast this spell a couple of times, and they ll kill you.  Oh,
ygData.messageBody:
Its an awesome spell as a joke. You can run up to parties that are fighting groups of monsters.. cast this spell a couple of times, and they'll kill you. Oh, wait. Nevermind. Its useless. =)

> ----------
> From: Jay Hollums[SMTP:jhollums@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 1:17 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Fire Fingers
>
> From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
>
> What good is this spell... I have never seen the damage on it so on that I
> cannot comment. However, if wizards are never suppose to tank... what good
> is a PB area effect spell? It is tough enough having every monster in an
> area attack you when you area effect spell them at range... much less at PB.
> Will some one give me some insight into this spell and others like it (PB
> area damage)?
>
> Rutreeii
